     * horizontally and depth-wise in pixels.

     * horizontally and depth-wise in pixels.

trailingComments.value: update state on mouse change and reset
delta values on next animation frame

leadingComments.value: update state on mouse change and reset
delta values on next animation frame

trailingComments.value: update mouse wheel deltas and then
reset them on the next animation frame
